title: Windmill Dragons: A Leah and Alan Adventure
description: A Junior Library Guild Selection.When Leah and Alan arrive in a chaotic land, they are the only people brave enough to try to set things right. Their path takes them through a magical world full of ancient monsters and aging knights. Relying on each other and a good deal of luck, they find their way to Monster Islandâ€”but in their quest to restore order, will they lose everything?
author: David Nytra
